modName: Priscilla's Song -The Wolven Storm- cover by Malukah
summary: Main menu music replacer for Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
I loved her version so much I created this main theme intro replacer for both Skyrim and Skyrim SE.
[i][color=#ffe599]Note that I already uploaded the SE version, I re-uploaded it again specifically for Skyrim.
So now NMM won't display the wrong information. Sorry for the inconvenience.[/color][/i]

I realise this isn't entirely "Lore" friendly, but I guess those who installed The Witcher 3 Music Overhaul mod,
might enjoy this too.

Installation:
download and install with NMM. If you allready installed The Witcher 3 Music Overhaul mod, 
than say "yes to all" to let my mod overwrite the files when prompted. 
 
Proof for permissions from both Malukah and CD Projekt RED slipped into the photo gallery.

Music: "Wolven Storm" from "The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt" by Marcin Przybyłowicz
performed by Malukah (www.Malukah.com)

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eOR2QYy670k&ab_channel=Malukah]original video[/url]

*DISCLAIMER*
I do NOT own the audio track used in this mod, all credit goes to CD Projekt RED, Marcin Przybyłowicz, and the magnificent Malukah.
author: Ginkarasu
